songs.title: Kanye’s Prayer
songs.lyrics:
["All We Got" Piano]

I want to extend a very special prayer to my big brother Kanye West. I know there's a lot of weird foo...folks out there. But you already know I'm a hundred grand, and I wanted to extend this prayer, extend this love, extend this love, all the way from Britain. We might come back early to come and see this man. Happy Thanksgiving.

["All We Got" Hook]
